name: Animal Heroes
description:
Animal Heroes is an infinite runner mobile game

A big booty is about to be stolen!

Help Pig & Cat get the last dollar while they try to escape from that great police chase. These two old school heroes will fight to the end, with the sole intention of making the world a better place.

Come on, what are you waiting for!
They are about to be caught!

Members: Creative Director
Game DesignerErik GarcíaProgrammerDavid Luengo González
